Description:
Example VST3 plug-in which uses VSTGUI and the inline editing capabilities of VSTGUI

Requirements:
- VSTGUI 4.x
- VST SDK 3.1 or newer
- Xcode 3.x or Visual Studio 2008 (Express should also work)

Building:
You just need to change the project settings so that the root of the VST3 SDK is in the header search path and build
